page.title: Alpharma Says Pfizer Drug Generic Cleared
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - A federal appeals court has cleared the way for Alpharma Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ALO.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ALO.N</A> to launch a generic form of Pfizer Inc's <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=PFE.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">PFE.N</A> Neurontin capsules to treat epilepsy, sending Alpharma shares sharply higher.
